# Download libraries
```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(knitr)
```

# Download data
```{r}
set.seed(123)
f_train <- read.csv2('bank_train.csv', header = TRUE, encoding = 'UNICOD')
f_test <- read.csv2('bank_test.csv', header = TRUE, encoding = 'UNICOD')
f_train <- f_train[-1]
f_test <- f_test[-1]
```

```{r  results='hide'}
library(neuralnet)

# fit neural network
nn = neuralnet(delays ~ income + age, f_train, hidden = 3, linear.output = T)

# plot neural network
plot(nn)
```
# Fitting the NN
```{r results='hide'}
library(nnet)
set.seed(11)
ff_cl <- nnet(data = f_train, delays ~ income + age, size = 2, maxit = 1000)
library(graphics)
source(file = 'plot.nnet.R')
plot.nnet(ff_cl)
```

## Predicting
```{r}
p_nn_cl <- predict(nn, f_test)
#p <- (p > 0.5)
#p <- as.factor(p_ff_cl)
```

#### Висновок: визначені класи об'єктів (вектор p)

## Confusion Matrix
```{r}
cm = table(f_test[, 'delays'], p)
print(cm)
```
